headline: Easy Chicken Cacciatore
name: Easy Chicken Cacciatore
description: A classic chicken cacciatore recipe that is easy and comforting. Chicken simmered with vegetables and tomatoes in a fragrant sauce with oregano.
recipeIngredient: 0.75 pound chicken meat, cooked and cubed

recipeInstructions.text: Sauté onion, bell pepper, and garlic in a large skillet until soft. Add chicken, then stir in tomatoes, beans, and oregano.
Reduce heat to medium-low and simmer, stirring constantly, for 8 to 10 minutes. Remove from heat and serve hot.
